title: Not really a question, just hoping Google can notice the rising Android 9 update
content:
1. Camera doesn't work, automatically kicking me and closing the app. Same as Snapchat which refuses to log me in.
2. Slow as hell for any online use.
3. Prevents me from sending images through text.
4. Opening YouTube is futile as it always remains loading.
5. And I'm willing to bet more issues will arise the longer the update sees no changes.
